name: Jme3-jfx
tagline: JFX Gui bridge for JME with usefull utilities for common usecases
body:
Welcome
![Showcase Teaser](http://i.imgur.com/i08eOpf.png)

This Project depends on jme3 [http://jmonkeyengine.org/](Link to jme3)

Many thanks to abies who created the underlying jfx bridge this is based on.
Also special thanks to everyone working on JME3 for being one of the most awesome Core-engines out there.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
